function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Implausible uninformative prior distributions on intervention effects","Impact":"Bias and inaccuracies in model results","Mitigation":"Use informed and plausible prior distributions for intervention effects","Technologies":"Statistical modeling and data analysis tools","People":"Researchers, statisticians, and data analysts","Owner":"Research team, data analysis team"},{"Description":"Lack of consideration for different lengths of epidemic in European countries","Impact":"Over-reliance on data from certain countries, leading to biased results","Mitigation":"Perform \"leave one country out\" sensitivity analysis to assess dependence on individual countries","Technologies":"Statistical modeling and data analysis tools","People":"Researchers, statisticians, and data analysts","Owner":"Research team, data analysis team"},{"Description":"Use of nonparametric function with a Gaussian process prior distribution","Impact":"Potential impact on model accuracy and interpretation","Mitigation":"Validate the nonparametric function against alternative models and assess its impact on model results","Technologies":"Statistical modeling and data analysis tools","People":"Researchers, statisticians, and data analysts","Owner":"Research team, data analysis team"}]}
